message: This offer divides the money 3:1 in favor of Alice. Please consider it, as future offers may not be as generous due to inflation.
I believe this is a fair split given the circumstances.  Accept now before inflation takes a bigger bite out of your share.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 3:2 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a reasonable difference in our shares while acknowledging the diminishing value of the money.
Let's be reasonable.  Inflation is hurting both of us, and a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go.
